title: Project: Emoji Whimsy
introduction: Introducing Emoji Whimsy! This addon will allow you to use emojis in your chat dialog! Simply type the emoji and then send! The final message will have your emoji! Enjoy!

content.text: When you type an emoji, it will show up like this in the preview chat dialog. But don't worry!
Because when you send the message, the emoji will show up like this!
It also works with signs too!
Tada! The emoji will show up on the sign!

postwarning: WARNING:  This Addon requires Beta APIs experimental to work properly!
